OpenSearchDescription.Description: Packy — Web NPM Bundler. Bundle npm packages directly in your browser. Use queries like react or react@18.2.0.
OpenSearchDescription.Tags: npm bundler web bundler browser bundler javascript typescript vite react
OpenSearchDescription.Attribution: Packy by Torben Haack. No backend. Fast, simple, privacy-friendly.
OpenSearchDescription.LongName: Packy — Web NPM Bundler | Bundle npm packages in your browser
